description:
Ever since February the Linux kernel has been it's own CNA, a CVE numbering authority, the organization responsible for publishing it's own vulnerabilities and since then the number of kernel CVEs has massively increased, so what went wrong? Or is it going just right.

title: The Linux Kernel Has Too Many CVEs
